name: LÖVE
body:
# Welcome to LÖVE.
Hi there! LÖVE is an *awesome* framework you can use to make 2D games in Lua. It's free, open-source, and works on Windows,Linux.

## Licence
LÖVE is licensed under the MIT licence ^_^

### Authors and Contributors
This version of LÖVE is created by Muresan Vlad Mihail. 
The original version of LÖVE can be found here: https://love2d.org/ . Do not post issues related to this version of LÖVE on their forums, instead you can post them on my github page.

#### Support or Contact
Having troubles with LÖVE? Make a new issue or leave me a message on twitter: https://twitter.com/Murii5
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
